TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeDomDesignerLoader extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService
Public MustInherit Class CodeDomDesignerLoader Inherits BasicDesignerLoader Implements IDesignerSerializationService, INameCreationService
type CodeDomDesignerLoader = class inherit BasicDesignerLoader interface INameCreationService interface IDesignerSerializationService

summary.span: 提供用于实现基于 CodeDOM 的设计器加载程序的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for implementing a CodeDOM-based designer loader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，它提供基于 (CodeDOM) 代码文档对象模型的完整设计器加载程序。 is an abstract class that provides a full designer loader based on the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM). 提供 CodeDOM 分析器和生成器以及类型解析服务。You provide the CodeDOM parser and generator, and a type resolution service.

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

value.span: 此设计器加载程序将使用的

span.span: The this designer loader will use

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器加载程序不从返回的中分析或生成代码 ，但它确实使用提供程序来获取 可用于验证名称创建服务中的标识符的。The designer loader does not parse or generate code from the returned , but it does use the provider to obtain an that it can use to validate identifiers in the name-creation service. 设计器加载程序还会检查 以查看它是否实现了 接口。The designer loader will also check the to see if it implements the interface. 有关分析或生成代码的详细信息，请参阅 和 方法。For more information on parsing or generating code, see the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 类使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除方法添加的服务 。The method removes services added by the method. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化服务。

span.span: Initializes services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了可替换的服务，这些服务 将添加到服务容器中。The following table describes the replaceable services that the adds to the service container. |术语Term|定义Definition| |----------|----------------| ||提供创建对象名称的语义。Provides semantics for creating names of objects. 服务使用 CodeDOM 提供程序的 接口来创建是语言的有效标识符的名称。The service uses the CodeDOM provider's interface to create names that are valid identifiers for the language. 此外，名称创建服务支持空名称。In addition, the name creation service supports empty names. 序列化期间应将空名称解释为临时局部变量。Empty names should be interpreted as temporary local variables during serialization.| ||允许其他对象将一组组件序列化为二进制对象。Allows other objects to serialize a group of components into a binary object. 此服务最常用于复制和粘贴或撤消和重做等功能。This service is most often used by features such as copy and paste or undo and redo. 类提供基于为对象创建 CodeDOM 树的设计器序列化服务。The class provides a designer serialization service that is based on creating CodeDOM trees for objects.| ||此服务替换 为将组件序列化为二进制对象的一种方法。This service replaces as a means to serialize components to a binary object.| 有关可替换服务和不可替换服务的详细信息，请参阅 。For details on replaceable and non-replaceable services, see .

exception.span: 尚未初始化，或设计器加载程序不支持类型解析服务，该服务是 CodeDom 序列化所必需的。

span.span: The has not been initialized, or the designer loader did not supply a type resolution service, which is required for CodeDom serialization.

span.span: if the decides a reload is required; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查中是否存在 接口 。The method checks for the presence of the interface on the . 提供程序将重新分析 CodeDOM 树，并将生成的分析树传递给 方法。The provider will reparse the CodeDOM tree and pass the resulting parse tree to the method. 如果此方法返回 `false` ，则不会重新加载设计器。If this method returns `false`, the designer will not be reloaded.

exception.span: 该语言不为此文件提供代码分析器；此文件类型可能不支持设计器。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以设计该类，但它不是文件中的第一个类，否则将无法设计此文件中的任何类，进而导致无法为此文件显示设计器。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformFlush(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformFlush (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager)

param.name: manager
param.span: 要从中请求序列化程序的 。

span.span: The from which to request the serializer.

summary.span: 请求设计器的根组件的序列化。

span.span: Requests serialization of the root component of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取 设计器根组件的根，并调用序列化程序来序列化组件。The method obtains the root for the root component of the designer and invokes the serializer to serialize the component. 如果此操作的结果是 ，则将 与现有的 CodeDOM 树集成。If the result of this operation is a , then integrates the with the existing CodeDOM tree. 结果是具有匹配成员和已替换的语句的原始 CodeDOM 树。The result is the original CodeDOM tree with matching members and statements replaced. 最后， 调用抽象 方法来保存此 CodeDOM 树。Finally, calls the abstract method to save this CodeDOM tree. 如果根设计器组件的序列化未导致 ，则 不会进一步执行操作。If the serialization of the root designer component does not result in a , then does nothing further. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用方负责确保 CodeDOM 源自受信任的源。It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source. 接受来自不受信任方的 CodeDOM 对象可能允许该参与方运行恶意代码。Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code. 将 CodeDOM 刷新到文件中时，框架将运行由 CodeDOM 对象表示的代码，并按所提供的方式运行对象的序列化内容。When flushing a CodeDOM into a file, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.

exception.span: 该语言不为此文件提供代码分析器；此文件类型可能不支持设计器。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以设计该类，但它不是文件中的第一个类，否则将无法设计此文件中的任何类，进而导致无法为此文件显示设计器。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformLoad(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformLoad (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager)

param.name: manager
param.span: 要从中请求序列化程序的 。

span.span: The from which to request the serializer.

summary.span: 分析来自 CodeDOM 提供程序的代码。

span.span: Parses code from a CodeDOM provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 从 CodeDOM 提供程序获取，并分析代码。The method obtains an from the CodeDOM provider and parses the code. 定位文件中的第一个类，获取 数据类型的根，然后调用序列化程序以反序列化数据类型。 locates the first class in the file, obtains a root for the data type, and then invokes the serializer to deserialize the data type. 假设此进程将在属性的中创建所有必要的组件 。 assumes that this process will create all necessary components in the of the property. 最后， 调用方法，该 方法具有传递给 CodeDOM 序列化程序的类型的完全限定名称。Finally, calls the method with the fully qualified name of the type it passed to the CodeDOM serializer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用方负责确保 CodeDOM 源自受信任的源。It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source. 接受来自不受信任方的 CodeDOM 对象可能允许该参与方运行恶意代码。Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code. 将 CodeDOM 加载到设计图面时，框架将运行由 CodeDOM 对象表示的代码，并按所提供的方式运行对象的序列化内容。When loading a CodeDOM into the design surface, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.

exception.span: 该语言不为此文件提供代码分析器；此文件类型可能不支持设计器。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以设计该类，但它不是文件中的第一个类，否则将无法设计此文件中的任何类，进而导致无法为此文件显示设计器。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected MustOverride ReadOnly Property TypeResolutionService As ITypeResolutionService

summary.span: 获取要与此设计器加载程序一起使用的类型解析服务。

span.span: Gets the type resolution service to be used with this designer loader.

value.span: CodeDOM 序列化程序在解析类型时将使用的 。

span.span: An that the CodeDOM serializers will use when resolving types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法时，会自动将此添加 到服务容器中 。The automatically adds this to the service container when the method is invoked. 尽管类型解析服务在许多方案中是可选的，但它是代码解释所必需的，因为源代码包含类型名称，但没有程序集引用。While the type resolution service is optional in many scenarios, it is required for code interpretation because source code contains type names, but no assembly references.

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit unit) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub Write (unit As CodeCompileUnit)

span.span: The to be persisted.

summary.span: 将编译单元更改写入永久存储区。

span.span: Writes compile-unit changes to persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将保存 到持久性存储中。The method saves a to persistent storage. 派生类负责对 适当的文本编写器调用以保存代码。The deriving class is responsible for invoking the on the appropriate text writer to save the code. 确保传递给的 CodeDOM 对象 是从检索的对象的相同实例 ，在序列化过程必须对代码进行更改的情况除外。The ensures that the CodeDOM objects that are passed to are the same instances of objects that were retrieved from , except in cases where the serialization process had to make changes to the code. 这允许经过优化的设计器加载程序将其他数据存储在 代码元素的属性中。This allows an optimized designer loader to store additional data in the property of code elements. 此数据将在 方法中用于未被序列化过程替换的任何元素。This data will be available during the method for any elements that were not replaced by the serialization process.

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译
